display.title: Utilising an End Spawner
display.description: Firstly to fuel the End Spawner you'll need to place a block of Crying Obsidian in the opening above the center Beacon. Then you may place Glow Item Frame(s) onto any of the 4 sides of the center Beacon. If a Mob Egg in then placed into the Glow Item Frame(s) the End Spawner will periodically summon the Mob type on top of the End Spawner [Required: 1x Crying Obsidian 1-4x Glow Item Frames 1-4x Any Mob Egg | Drop Craft With: End Spawner]
